DOC.brief_title: Study Efficacy Safety BP101 Female Patients With Decrease Loss Sexual Desire
DOC.criteria: Women age 21 old , sign informed concent , regular menstrual cycle ( STRAW stag 5 3 ( see Annex 7 ) ) . The level folliclestimulating hormone ( FSH ) 25 milliInternational unit per ml ( mIU/ml ) accord screen value . Decrease loss sexual desire ( ICD10 code : F52.0 ) correspond hypoactive sexual desire disorder ( HSDD ) diagnose accord Diagnostic Statistical Manual Mental Disorders , 4th Edition ( DSM4 ) , criterion . Current HSDD episode last less 24 week . Patients secondary female sexual arousal disorder ( FSAD ) and/or female orgasmic disorder ( FOD ) eligible HSDD develop FSAD and/or FOD HSDD significant impact patient 's quality life . Not less 15 score accord FSDSR ( Distress ) Total Score . Stable monogamous relationship one sexually active male sexual partner last least year . The partner physically available less 50 % time month . Consent attempt sexual intercourse least twice month , desire . Consent complete diary every day screen period assessment baseline state ( period diary record must cover ≥80 % day ) , therapy subsequent followup . Consent use adequate method contraception throughout study . Any prohibit treatment . Other mental disorder psychiatric disease . Score ≥ 20 accord Beck Depression Inventory screening . Patients 16 19 score accord Beck 's inventory may include study unless , investigator 's opinion , actual depressive disorder observe patient . Inflammatory disease pelvic organ , infection genitourinary system , cervicitis , interstitial cystitis , vulvodynia severe atrophy vaginal epithelium . Surgical intervention ( cosmetic surgery ) reproductive organ past medical history ( ovariectomy , hysterectomy , obvious scar childbirthrelated perineal stitch , etc ) . Pregnant nursing woman nonlactating woman first 12 month childbirth . Consumption 5 portion alcoholic drink per week alcohol addiction , drug addiction drug abuse past . One portion alcoholic drink mean 360 ml beer , 120 ml wine 30 ml strong alcoholic drink .
